price: 12. Hij zei: “Mijn Heer! Waarlijk, ik vrees dat zij mij zullen verloochenen,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
